Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students using a string telephone to show communication over a distance.
The student can illustrate the string connecting two cups, highlighting how the device uses sound to communicate.
The student can include labels showing important parts of the string telephone, such as the string and cups.
The student can use arrows or sound waves to represent the movement of sound from one student to the other, indicating how the device works.
The student can show how the string should be tight between the cups to effectively transmit sound.
